item.description:
JANUARY 11  (Friday) SINGLES SNOWFLAKE DANCE at Nuchie’s in Bristol from 8 pm to 12 am.  Be sure to come and bring your friends.  Enjoy the evening and dance the night away to our DJ - Tasteful   Productions.  There will be a delicious buffet from 8 to 9:30 pm to enjoy.  This is our first dance after the holidays.  Join us for a fun night!  Dress to impress and door prizes.  Members $12, Guests $17.  For info, call Gail at 860-582-8229.  Directions to 164 Central Street:  I‑84 to Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), go to end, turn right, at 2nd light facility on right, park both sides of building.

**********************************************************************************************************
item.how_to_find_us: ask for Gail, tell her you are from Nancy's meetup

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Snowflake dance at Nuchies
